title: Can't click with mouse or input key presses once loaded into game.
body: Everything works until im loaded into the game, then I can't move, cast spells, hit escape to edit settings, or anything. I have reinstalled the client, deleted config folder, ran game as admin, and even tried to defrag my harddrive. This problem has lost me 2 games. Please help.

replies.body: Assuming these are mouse buttons 4 and 5, this has been an issue with the Creator update on Windows.  Currently, rolling back that version should fix that up.  Hopefully that can help in the meantime until further updates work towards fixing that up.
